name: Favorite Mods
description: Add installed Geode mods as your favorites!

issues.info: Report any issues to our repository!

enabled-only.name: Only List Enabled Mods
enabled-only.description: Only load the list with mods that you have <cg>enabled</c> on your Geode client.

minimal.name: Minimalist List
minimal.description: Show only important details of a mod in the favorites list.

pages.name: List Pages
pages.description: Split the full mod list into multiple pages.

pages-count.name: Mods Per Page
pages-count.description: How many mods to show at a time in one page.
pages-count.enable-if-description: Enable pages to adjust list limits.

settings-btn.name: Mod Settings Button
settings-btn.description: Create a quickly accessible mod settings button in the favorites pop-up.

auto-scroll.name: Automatically Scroll Up
auto-scroll.description: Snap the scroll area to the top when changing favorites.

refresh-clear-search.name: Clear Search on Refresh
refresh-clear-search.description: Clear the search box when filtering the mod list.

hearts.name: Hearts
hearts.description: Use heart icons instead of star icons! <3
